backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing products, carts, orders, and user profiles with access control and various query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short predefined summaries for all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all storefront routes within a themed layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to submit their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard component that blocks access to protected pages and prompts login when needed.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartItemRow: Renders a cart item row with quantity controls, price display, and remove button, updating quantities via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays a simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Provides the site header with navigation, cart icon with count, login controls, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Wraps the page with a header, footer, and main content outlet.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Shows a product card with image, title, price, and a link to view details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login methods, and context provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for products, cart, checkout, orders, and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables and theme support for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccountOrdersPage.tsx: Displays a user's past orders with loading states and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart contents, allows quantity updates and item removal, and calculates subtotal before checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow, shows order summary, and submits order creation with success or error handling.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays confirmation details for a completed order, including items and total, with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific order, including product data and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays product details, image, and description, and supports selecting quantity and adding to cart.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListPage.tsx: A React page that fetches products, applies client-side sorting, handles loading and error states, and renders a product list with a hero banner and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme styles, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing goals, features, requirements, architecture notes, and image requirements for an eâ€‘commerce application.
